Package il.org.spartan

Class Separator

  • java.lang.Object
    • il.org.spartan.Separator
  • public final class Separator
extends java.lang.Object
    A class representing a separator string, which can be used for separating elements of a sequence while printing it, without special case treatment of the first and last element. For example, the following program prints a list of its arguments separated by commas, without using any conditionals. 
     static void main(String[] args) {
   Separator s = new Separator(", ");
   for (String a : args)
     System.out.print(s + a);
 }
    Since:
    12/02/2006)
    Author:
    Yossi Gil
